description: This file defines a React component 'FavoritesPage' that renders a user's favorite recipes, including display, navigation, and removal functionality. It uses context for favorites data and a custom navigation utility.

methods.name: FavoritesPage()
methods.description: React functional component that renders the favorites page, displaying saved recipes with options to open or remove them.

methods.name: openRecipe
methods.description: Navigates to the detailed view of a selected favorite recipe.

methods.name: goBack
methods.description: Navigates back to the home or browse page.
